G

GameBoard - Class in model
The GameBoard class holds the information about the game board, as well as do some operations on the board, such as GameBoard.nextGeneration(), and sets the cell states to either dead or alive.
GameBoard(int, int) - Constructor for class model.GameBoard
GameBoard public GameBoard(int columns, int rows) The constructor of the class, creates a board with given rows and columns.
gameRules() - Method in class model.GameBoard
gameRules public {@link GameRules } gameRules() Returns the object containing the rules for the board.
GameRules - Class in model
This class manages the rules of Conway's Game of Life.
GameRules() - Constructor for class model.GameRules
GameRules private GameRules() RulesBirth and RuleSurvive array is created with 9 empty elements.
